page.title: 10RELIGION IN DOVER.
page.content: THERE ARE MANY DIFFERENT CHRISTIAN CHURCHES IN OUR AREA;BUT THERE ARE NONE CATERING FOR ETHNIC MINORITIES OR JEWS. THE MAJORITY OF THE CHURCHES IN THE AREA ARE ANGLICAN BUT THERE ARE 2 ROMAN CATHOLIC AND SEVERAL FREE CHURCHES;THE FREE CHURCHES INCLUDE:BABTIST,METHODIST,UNITED REFORM,PENTOCOSTAL ETC.THERE IS ALSO A MEETING HOUSE FOR THE SOCIETY OF FRIENDS (QUAKERS) AND A SALVATION ARMY CITADEL. THE ANGLICAN CHURCHES ARE ALL HOUSED IN OLD BUILDINGS SURROUNDED BY THEIR PARISHES.THE CHURCH OF ST.ANDREW IN BUCKLAND IS OF NORMAN ORIGIN AND IN THE CHURCHYARD THERE IS A VERY OLD YEW TREE. MANY OF THE CHURCHES HAVE A THRIVING SOCIAL PROGRAMME FOR ALL AGE GROUPS.
